title: Fragment, 14th–15th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: resist-printed on plain weave
description: Design is resist-printed in indigo, reserved in natural color; shows top half of a shield shape with border enclosing arabesques or vines.  A stylized lotus is inside the "shield" and below, half of a round petal shape is visible.  Printing on reverse is identical and equally clear.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 14th–15th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: resist-printed on plain weave. 1957-115-6.
